effects.effect: Choose one of the following abilities.

features.name: Interphase
features.flavor: You slip into a faster timestream to act more quickly.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
You can use up to three signature abilities, each of which gains an edge.
###### Phase Step (9 Discipline)
*You weaken your connection to this manifold, allowing you to move through and damage enemies.*
| **Melee, Psionic, Weapon** | **Main action** |
| -------------------------- | --------------: |
| **üìè Self; see below**     |     **üéØ Self** |

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You can shift up to your speed, and squares occupied by enemies or objects are not difficult terrain for this shift. You make one power roll that targets each enemy you moved through during this shift.
